label: A4B3_tI28_141_cd_ae-002
title: Paramelaconite (Cu$_{4}$O$_{3}$) Structure
comments: (O'Keeffe, 1968) indicate that the atom they call O(2) (our O-I) is located at the (4a) Wyckoff position, but give the coordinates of the (4b) Wyckoff position.  The coordinates are correct, however we shift the origin so that the O-I atom is on the (4a) site.  This maps their atom Cu(1) to our Cu-II, and Cu(2) to Cu-I.
